```{R}
q1=0;q2=0.03
s10=100;s20=150
sigma1=0.5;sigma2=0.4
T=1;K=250
rho=0.1;r=0.01
mu1=log(s10)+(r-q1-0.5*sigma1^2)*T
mu2=log(s20)+(r-q2-0.5*sigma2^2)*T
mu1
mu2
a=exp(mu1+0.5*sigma1^2)+exp(mu2+0.5*sigma2^2)
b=exp(2*mu1+2*sigma1^2)+exp(2*mu2+2*sigma2^2)+2*exp(mu1+mu2+0.5*(sigma1^2+sigma2^2+2*rho*sigma1*sigma2))
a
b
mu=log(a^2/sqrt(b))
sigmat=sqrt(log(b/a^2))
mu
sigmat
```


```{R}
c=exp(-r*T)*exp(mu+0.5*sigmat^2)*pnorm((mu+sigmat^2-log(K))/sigmat)-K*pnorm((mu-log(K))/sigmat)
c
```

```{R}
n=10000
z=z1=rnorm(n);
z2=rho*z1+sqrt(1-rho^2)*z
s1t=s10*exp((r-q1-0.5*sigma1^2)*T+sigma1*sqrt(T)*z1)
s2t=s20*exp((r-q2-0.5*sigma2^2)*T+sigma2*sqrt(T)*z2)
y=s1t+s2t-K
y[y<0]=0

x=exp(-r*T)*y
m=mean(x);sd=sd(x)
sd
```

```{R}
n=40000
z=z1=rnorm(n);

s2t=s20*exp((r-q2-0.5*sigma2^2)*T+sigma2*sqrt(T)*z2)
y=s1t+s2t-K
y[y<0]=0

x=exp(-r*T)*y
m=mean(x);sd=sd(x)
sd
```

```{R}
n=40960000
z=z1=rnorm(n);
z2=rho*z1+sqrt(1-rho^2)*z
s1t=s10*exp((r-q1-0.5*sigma1^2)*T+sigma1*sqrt(T)*z1)
s2t=s20*exp((r-q2-0.5*sigma2^2)*T+sigma2*sqrt(T)*z2)
y=s1t+s2t-K
y[y<0]=0

x=exp(-r*T)*y
m=mean(x);sd=sd(x)
m
sd
samplese=sd/sqrt(n)
samplese
alpha=0.05
z=qnorm(1-alpha/2)
lb=m-z*sd/sqrt(n)
ub=m+z*sd/sqrt(n)
lb
ub
```

```{R}
n=40960000
z=z1=rnorm(n);
z2=rho*z1+sqrt(1-rho^2)*z
s1t=s10*exp((r-q1-0.5*sigma1^2)*T+sigma1*sqrt(T)*z1)
s2t=s20*exp((r-q2-0.5*sigma2^2)*T+sigma2*sqrt(T)*z2)
y=K-(s1t+s2t)
y[y<0]=0

x=exp(-r*T)*y
m=mean(x);sd=sd(x)
m
sd
samplese=sd/sqrt(n)
samplese
alpha=0.05
z=qnorm(1-alpha/2)
lb=m-z*sd/sqrt(n)
ub=m+z*sd/sqrt(n)
lb
ub
```
